definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: The suspension system is the device which connects the frame and the axle.
sentences.chinese: 汽車懸架是車架與車橋之間的動力連接裝置。

sentences.english: Pin connected main frame, short turning radius, flexible mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 鉸接式車架，轉彎半徑小，機動靈活。

sentences.english: Removable CF die cast rear subframe is light and strong.
sentences.chinese: 壓鑄後方可拆卸CF卡是重量輕，強度副車架。

sentences.english: They also are installing thousands of on-street bike racks .
sentences.chinese: 交通官員還在馬路上安裝自行車車架。

sentences.english: Reinforcement brackets are retained on frame sills with 4 studs.
sentences.chinese: 用4個螺椿將加固托架固定在車架樑上。

sentences.english: If necessary, remove bolts attaching bumper mounting brackets to frame.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要，拆去連接保險桿固定托架到車架的螺栓。

sentences.english: The front subframe is modified for extra camber and castor.
sentences.chinese: 前副車架被修改爲額外拱形和蓖麻。

sentences.english: An extra wheel mounted to its frame spun backwards and canceled out the gyro effect.
sentences.chinese: 他在後輪的車架上安裝了一個附加輪以抵消陀螺效應。

sentences.english: Without stopping to think, Boyle reached under the frame of the car and lifted.
sentences.chinese: 博伊爾沒有多想，夠着汽車車架就把它擡起來。

sentences.english: The steering knuckle then supported through Ball joints, by upper and lower control arms which are attached to the car frame.
sentences.chinese: 轉向節通過球頭節與安裝在車架上的上下控制臂相連。

sentences.english: Ultra-light frame, thick wall, more solid.
sentences.chinese: 超輕車架，厚管壁，更結實。

sentences.english: Frame rail or strut tower out of position or damaged.
sentences.chinese: 車架樑或支柱塔位置不正或損壞。

sentences.english: A frame type mast structure of side-loading is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了一種側面叉車側板承載框架式車架結構。

sentences.english: Using paint or grease pencil, mark outline of crossmember on frame rails .
sentences.chinese: 使用油漆或油性筆，將橫樑的輪廓標記在車架軌道上。

sentences.english: The frame is a load-carrying beam structure of automobile.
sentences.chinese: 車架是汽車上起承載作用的梁結構。

sentences.english: The EV is made from an aluminum space-frame and has winged doors.
sentences.chinese: 整車採用鋁管式車架和鷗翼車門。
